\begin{align*}
y_{ijklmnopq} = & \mu + \beta_1 \text{log(distance)} + \alpha_i + \delta_j + \gamma_k + \theta_l + (\alpha \delta)_{ij} + (\alpha \gamma)_{ik} + (\alpha \theta)_{il} + \\ 
 & (\delta \gamma)_{jk} + (\delta \theta)_{jl} + (\gamma \theta)_{kl} + (\alpha \delta \gamma)_{ijk} + (\alpha \delta \theta)_{ijl} + (\alpha \gamma \theta)_{ikl} + (\delta \gamma \theta)_{jkl} + \\
 & (\alpha \delta \gamma \theta)_{ijkl} + c_m + d_n + f_o + g_p + e_{ijklmnopq} \\
\\
\text{Fixed Variables} \\
\alpha_i = & \text{ passenger_count (6 levels)} \\
\delta_j = & \text{ month (12 levels)} \\
\gamma_k = & \text{ toll_ind (2 levels)} \\
\theta_l = & \text{ rate_code (3 levels)} \\
\\
\text{Random Variables} \\
c_m = & \text{ pickup_location (50 levels)} \\
d_n = & \text{ dropoff_location (50 levels)} \\
f_o = & \text{ pickup_time (24 levels)} \\
g_p = & \text{ dropoff_time (24 levels)} \\
e_q = & \text{ error} \\
\end{align*}
